objects.text:
• Premium Faux Leather
• Spacious Storage Design
• Gold-Tone Hardware
• Perfect Everyday Size

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a high-contrast, modern layout with a luxurious and minimalistic aesthetic suitable for promoting fashion accessories. The background consists of a dark grid pattern with muted gold lines, providing depth and elegance. The "brand_logo" text appears in bold gold lettering at the top left, establishing brand presence. Below it, the "heading" and "subheading" convey product type and category using white and gold fonts respectively. A centered high-quality "product_image" on the right dominates the composition. The "description" lists key features in white bullet points. The "price" stands out in bold gold, complemented by a "cta_button" featuring a gold rectangle with black "cta" text.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: `#0D0D0D`
- Charcoal: `#1A1A1A`
- Onyx: `#151515`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Metallic Gold: `#D4AF37`
- Black: `#000000`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and elegant black handbag with refined gold hardware accents. The dominant color, matte textured black (#1C1C1C), sets a bold and sophisticated base, while the polished gold (#D4AF37) hardware elements create striking highlights that draw attention to brand details and accessories. The contrast between matte and metallic finishes ensures each component stands out while still blending harmoniously. The color palette can include: Deep Black (#1C1C1C), Metallic Gold (#D4AF37), Charcoal Gray (#2A2A2A), and Soft Ivory (#F5F5F5) for background or text. These colors can evoke luxury, professionalism, and classic style in a sleek advertisement banner.
